donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
On the course of priority projects' design by the regional and municipal offices for project development as well as other non-public agencies of local development, a number of issues were detected which delayed the process. In the first place, a noted lack of capacities exists in project design among local stakeholders. In this context Art Gold 2 Albania will provide the following: 

1. Capacity building activities in project proposal writing 
2. A competitive project award scheme

The aforementioned interventions will be conducted in the regions of Shkodra and Vlora and will be delivered in 4 main phases: 

Phase 1:  prepares the ground for the training sessions by creating and printing a Training Manual containing outstanding and expert/best practices information on project proposal writing targeted to specific local stakeholders in the region of Vlora and Shkodra.  

Phase 2: deals with the arrangement of seminars, workshops and conferences where stakeholders will be trained and equipped with the right skills on project proposal writing.  

Phase 3: deals with the completion of the stakeholder's projects which should be in their final form ready for submission. 

Phase 4: deals with application of a competitive award scheme as a sign of good will. A lump sum of seed funds will be allocated to best projects emerging during the capacity building activities.

project_descr: One UN Support to Art Gold2 Albania
project_title: One UN Support to Art Gold2 Albania
